column2: For centuries now, the Children of Caharl have been slowly dying. The constant assault by servants of the Cross, both mortal and dead, has converted their once pious flock to a small, weak people. But no more. As the invasion by German Ventrue collapses, and proud Einherjar once again instill terror into the hearts of the Children of Caine, the faith is reborn anew. Under a new leader, with new doctrines and leadership, the Einherjar are now something greater than even Odin could have imagined, the Wanderer chooses them well, and they are now his family, the Aesir of tomorrow. They are boldly stepping into this age as the Vikings Gods they truly are.  As they cuddle, terrified, in their broody castles, the weak southern vampires have nothing to hope but a merciful death when their very own Ragnarok comes. And it will be soon.
They are wrong. Ragnarok is still coming.
Gehenna is coming from the frozen north.
The Children of Caharl are endured Ragnarok and came back from it stronger than ever.
The followers of Odin have begun gathering in secret in this area. They are preparing to unleash Ragnarok to all the weak Children of Caine if they choose to resist.
